channel.title: fp-ts on Josh Wulf
channel.description: Recent content in fp-ts on Josh Wulf

item.title: A Functional Refactor of Zeebe Node with fp-ts
item.description: There is no such thing as good coding, only good refactoring. I recently did a bunch of work on the Zeebe Node.js client for the upcoming 0.23 release. Zeebe Node is a client library for the Zeebe Microservices Workflow Orchestration Engine, and I maintain it. While doing other work, I took the opportunity to refactor one method, deployWorkflows, to add a feature that I wanted it to have. I used fp-ts, a TypeScript Functional Programming library to do it.
